title: Charlotte Trade Shows Boost Brand Visibility with Custom Canopy Tents

title: NC Women Charged in Torture and Death of Girl in Charlotte
summary: Three women in North Carolina are accused of torturing and killing a girl, keeping her in a dog crate at a Charlotte home.
